rows.label: qst711501_msg0002
rows.name:
You could say I'm an adventurer. But I
also have a scholarly interest in the
links between ether and Divine Beasts.

rows.label: qst711501_msg0003
rows.name:
Do you lot know anything about this
atmospheric disturbance called the
ether miasma?

rows.label: qst711501_msg0004
rows.name:
There's been a few of these ether
miasmas popping up round Gula
lately. Only little ones, mind.

rows.label: qst711501_msg0005
rows.name:
I was going to go and have a look
myself, but I got set upon by monsters
before I could get very far.

rows.label: qst711501_msg0006
rows.name:
To be honest, it's more the intellectual
side of adventuring that I'm into. I'm
not too great at all the rough stuff.

rows.label: qst711501_msg0007
rows.name:
So, I was just wondering if you lot
could help me out?

rows.label: qst711501_msg0008
rows.name:
I bet you'd make light work of the
Espina Feris that caused me such
bother last time.

rows.label: qst711501_msg0009
rows.name:
If you'll help me, it'll let me really get
stuck into my ether miasma related
research, you see.

rows.label: qst711501_msg0010
rows.name:
Well, I'll leave it up to you.
You look like you can handle it!
